title: NA offers Fateha for policeman martyred in Lahore
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 25 (APP): The National Assembly on Wednesday offered Fateha for the policeman martyred in Lahore and those killed in Khaira Gali bus accident.
Constable Kamal Ahmad was killed during an operation in Lahoreâ€™s Model Town locality after an unidentified person opened fire on him.
Moulana Abdul Akbar Chitrali offered the Fateha on the request of Speaker Raja Pervaiz Ashraf.
